content.prompt: The excerpt can best be used to explain which of the following situations that resulted from the Spanish-American War?

choices.label: The expanded use of international communication technologies
The growing influence of groups advocating for isolationism
The creation of international organizations to mediate diplomatic conflicts
The emergence of nationalist movements in areas under United States control

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
